node.doctext:
The Endless

Death
Dream--Morpheus--The Sandman--The Shaper of Form (Roman)--King of Dreams
Desire
Destiny
Delight/Delirium
Destruction
Despair



Extra Sandman Characters:

  • [The Corinthian]
  • [Fiddler's Green]
  • [Brute]
  • [Glob]
  • [Cain]
  • [Abel]
  • [The Hecatae]--The Fates (Morae)--Clotho, Lachesis, and Atropos----Crone, Mother, Maiden--Three-in-One--Maat, Hathor, and Nekhbet (Egyptian)--The Furies: Tisiphone, Megaera, and Alecto--Roman: Parcae or Fortune...Juventas the maiden, Juno the mother, and Minerva the wise old crone.--Norse: Norns...Urth, Verthandi, and Skald--Weird Sisters--Irish Celtic: The Morrigan...Nemhan, Babd, and Macha--
  • [Lucien]
  • [Nuala]
  • [Titania]
  • [Auberon]
  • [John Dee]--Doctor Destiny
  • [John Constantine]
  • [Hob Gadling]
  • [Mad Hettie]
  • [Calliope]
  • [Loki]
  • [Lucipher Morningstar]
  • [Hobgoblin]?
  • [Roderick Burgess]
  • [Orpheus]
  • [The lady of the cave]--Eve?--The Raven Woman--Lillith?
  • [Matthew]--the crow/raven
  • [The Gates of Horn and Ivory]
  • []
  • []
